semsim.utilities

Class SemSimUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • semsim.utilities.SemSimUtil

  • public class SemSimUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utility methods for working with SemSim models

    • Method Detail

      • flattenModel

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> flattenModel(SemSimModel model)
        Removes the FunctionalSubmodel structures within a model. Creates a "flattened" model where there are no MappableVariables. For merging a model that has a CellML component structure with one that does not.
        Parameters:
        model - The model to flatten
        Returns:
        Map of the changed data structure names

      • replaceCodewordInAllEquations

        public static java.lang.Boolean replaceCodewordInAllEquations(DataStructure discardedds,
                                                              DataStructure keptds,
                                                              SemSimModel modelfordiscardedds,
                                                              java.lang.String oldtext,
                                                              java.lang.String replacementtext,
                                                              org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<java.lang.Double,java.lang.String> conversionfactor)
        Replace all occurrences of a codeword in a model's equations with another
        Parameters:
        discardedds - The DataStructure representing the codeword you want to replace
        keptds - The DataStructure representing the replacement codeword
        modelfordiscardedds - The model containing the discardedds parameter
        oldtext - The specific text you want to replace
        replacementtext - The replacement text
        conversionfactor - The multiplier needed to ensure unit balance between the replaced codeword and the replacement
        Returns:
        Whether the parameter "oldtext" is the name of a data structure that is used to compute its own derivative

      • replaceCodewordsInString

        public static java.lang.String replaceCodewordsInString(java.lang.String exp,
                                                        java.lang.String kept,
                                                        java.lang.String discarded)
        Replace all occurrences of a sub-string within a mathematical expression. Uses greedy qualifier.
        Parameters:
        exp - The expression that will be processed for replacement
        kept - The replacement string
        discarded - The string to be replaced
        Returns:
        A string containing any replacements

      • replaceCodewordsInString

        public static java.lang.String replaceCodewordsInString(java.lang.String exp,
                                                        java.lang.String kept,
                                                        java.lang.String discarded,
                                                        SemSimUtil.regexQualifier qual)
        Replace all occurrences of a sub-string within a mathematical expression. Overloaded method for specifying regex qualifier type.
        Parameters:
        exp - The expression that will be processed for replacement
        kept - The replacement string
        discarded - The string to be replaced
        qual - The type of regex qualifier to use
        Returns:
        A string containing any replacements

      • getComputationalInputsFromMathML

        public static java.util.Set<DataStructure> getComputationalInputsFromMathML(SemSimModel semsimmodel,
                                                                            java.lang.String mathmlstring,
                                                                            java.lang.String nameprefix)
        Collect all the variables in a block of MathML that are inputs for the mathematical expression
        Parameters:
        semsimmodel - The source SemSim model
        mathmlstring - The MathML string to process for inputs
        nameprefix - Prefix to use for inputs that are local to a submodel
        Returns:
        All the variables in a block of MathML that are inputs for the MathML expression

      • getInputNamesFromMathML

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getInputNamesFromMathML(java.lang.String mathmlstring,
                                                                                       java.lang.String nameprefix)
        Get names of terms used in a MathML string
        Parameters:
        mathmlstring - A MathML string
        nameprefix - Optional prefix for mapping an input name to a SemSim-formatted name
        Returns:
        Names of inputs used in MathML mapped to option prefixed names

      • setComputationInputsForDataStructure

        public static void setComputationInputsForDataStructure(SemSimModel semsimmodel,
                                                        DataStructure outputds,
                                                        java.lang.String prefix)
        Set the computational inputs for a DataStructure based on its main MathML block and the MathML associated with any Event that effects the DataStructure's value.
        Parameters:
        semsimmodel - The model containing the DataStructure
        outputds - The DataStructure that will have its computational inputs set
        prefix - An optional prefix to use for inputs that are local to a submodel

      • addLHStoMathML

        public static java.lang.String addLHStoMathML(java.lang.String mathmlstring,
                                              java.lang.String varname,
                                              boolean isODE,
                                              java.lang.String timedomainname)
        Add the left-hand side of a MathML equation
        Parameters:
        mathmlstring - The right-hand side of a MathML equation
        varname - The name of the solved variable
        isODE - Whether the variable is solved with an ODE
        timedomainname - Name of time domain to use in MathML
        Returns:
        The MathML equation containing both the left- and right-hand side

      • makeLHSforStateVariable

        public static java.lang.String makeLHSforStateVariable(java.lang.String varname,
                                                       java.lang.String timedomainname)
        Create the MathML left-hand side for a variable that is solved using an ODE
        Parameters:
        varname - Name of the variable
        timedomainname - Name of the time domain to use when formulating the MathML
        Returns:
        Left-hand side of the MathML used for a variable that is solved using an ODE

      • getRHSofMathML

        public static java.lang.String getRHSofMathML(java.lang.String mathmlstring,
                                              java.lang.String solvedvarlocalname)
        Find the right hand side of the equation for a data structure from the MathML associated with the data structure's computation.
        Parameters:
        mathmlstring - The MathML string for the data structure's computation
        solvedvarlocalname - The name of the data structure, stripped of all submodel prefixes
        Returns:
        A MathML string representing the right hand side of the equation used to compute the data structure's value

      • mathmlHasLHS

        public static boolean mathmlHasLHS(java.lang.String mathml)
        Parameters:
        mathml - Some MathML as a String
        Returns:
        Whether the MathML includes a left-hand side

      • getEquivalentCompositeEntityIfAlreadyInMap

        public static CompositePhysicalEntity getEquivalentCompositeEntityIfAlreadyInMap(CompositePhysicalEntity cpe,
                                                                                 java.util.Map<? extends PhysicalModelComponent,java.net.URI> map)
        Determine if a given CompositePhysicalEntity is in the keyset of an input map that relates PhysicalModelComponents to associated URIs
        Parameters:
        cpe - An input CompositePhysicalEntity
        map - A Map that relates PhysicalModelComponents to associated URIs
        Returns:
        The Map key that is equivalent to the input CompositePhysicalEntity, if present, otherwise the input CompositePhysicalEntity

      • alphebetizeSemSimObjects

        public static java.util.ArrayList<DataStructure> alphebetizeSemSimObjects(java.util.Collection<DataStructure> collection)
        Take collection of DataStructures and return an ArrayList sorted alphabetically
        Parameters:
        collection - A set of data structures
        Returns:
        Alphabetized list of data structures based on their names

      • regularizePhysicalProperties

        public static void regularizePhysicalProperties(SemSimModel model,
                                                SemSimLibrary lib)
        Replace all OPB physical properties with their equivalent in the list contained in the SemSimLibrary; thereby maintaining a single set of unique property instances
        Parameters:
        model - The model containing the properties to regularize
        lib - A SemSimLibrary instance

      • getAllUnitsAsFundamentalBaseUnits

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<UnitFactor>> getAllUnitsAsFundamentalBaseUnits(SemSimModel semsimmodel,
                                                                                                              java.lang.String cfgpath)
        Given a SemSim model, recursively processes custom units and returns all of its units broken down into fundamental base units
        Parameters:
        semsimmodel - A SemSim model
        cfgpath - Path to configuration folder
        Returns:
        HashMap of customUnit:(baseUnit1:exp1, baseUnit:exp2, ...)

      • recurseBaseUnits

        public static java.util.Set<UnitFactor> recurseBaseUnits(UnitOfMeasurement uom,
                                                         java.lang.Double oldExp,
                                                         SemSimLibrary sslib)
        Used in tandem with method "getFundamentalBaseUnits" to decompose a unit into its fundamental elements
        Parameters:
        uom - Unit to decompose
        oldExp - Exponent applied to the unit from its use as a unit factor in another "parent" unit
        sslib - A SemSimLibrary instance
        Returns:
        Fundamental set of UnitFactors comprising the unit

      • createUnitNameMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> createUnitNameMap(SemSimModel semsimmodel,
                                                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
        Create map of unit names that needed to be changed (i.e. given a valid name) when writing out a CellML or SBML model
        Parameters:
        semsimmodel - The SemSimModel that was written out
        map - An old-to-new name map that will be appended by the method
        Returns:
        An old-to-new name map that includes mappings between old and new unit names

      • makeValidUnitNameForCellMLorSBML

        public static java.lang.String makeValidUnitNameForCellMLorSBML(java.lang.String oldname)
        Create a CellML- and SBML-friendly unit name from an input name
        Parameters:
        oldname - An input unit name
        Returns:
        A CellML- and SBML-friendly unit name
